day_1.subject: Mandatory Meeting: Project Brainstorming
day_1.body: You are invited to the meeting this 2PM, located in the southwing building hall 4H 21st floor.

day_1.subject: Report on missing lunch
day_1.body: An employee has reported that someone has been stealing their sandwich, they have approached the HR and requested whoever is stealing their tuna sandwich with spicy garlic sauce to stop what they are doing!

day_1.subject: Free Coffee Refills
day_1.body: As a loving member of the company, we are happy to announce that a new benefit has been implemented, UNLIMITED coffee refills! now you can enjoy working more hours and make your overtime shifts a little bit easier.

day_1.subject: A Warm Welcome!
day_1.body: Coming from the HR, we are glad to have you on the company! We hope you get comfortable in your new working environment. A employee access ID card will be sent to you soon so you can be able to access the cafeteria.

day_2.subject: Free Cats (URGENT)
day_2.body: Dear Human, My 27 cats have unionized and demand more treats. I need to rehome them ASAP. They’re fluent in Morse code and hate Mondays. Please adopt at least five. No returns. — Desperately Yours, Linda

day_2.subject: Quest Invitation: The Orb of Eternity
day_2.body: Brave Adventurer, The Guild of Arcane Light needs YOU to retrieve the stolen Orb from the Lich King’s fortress. Reward: 10,000 gold + immortality (terms apply). Reply ‘YES’ to accept. Warning: May involve dragons.

day_2.subject: Daily Meeting Hall 4H
day_2.body: We will be conducting our daily meetup at 2PM 21st floor, hall 4H, see you there.

day_2.subject: Zoom meeting regarding previous release
day_2.body: It turns out that our previous release of our product had critical bugs that makes it unusable, all engineers are scheduled for a zoom meeting 8:00 PM.

day_2.subject: Concerns about code malpractice
day_2.body: Some of our engineers in the team had pushed some code that are not compliant with our standards, please reply to this email if you have concerns about the rules thank you!

day_2.subject: They’re Watching
day_2.body: I found your email carved into my wall this morning. You need to leave town NOW. The shadows aren’t shadows. Don’t trust the man with no face. Burn this message.— [REDACTED]

day_2.subject: Spam Emails
day_2.body: Spam e-mails has been much of a concern lately, it started around last week and nobody knows how spammers got the company's personal emails. Please be careful in reading and interacting with such spams as it may cause trouble.

day_3.subject: Your Toaster Warranty Expires Soon
day_3.body: Hi, This is your final warning! Your toaster (model: TX-9000) will self-destruct in 24 hours unless you renew its warranty. Click here to pay $999.99. Seriously, it’s flammable.

day_3.subject: Earthling, We Need Your Help
day_3.body: Greetings! We are the Zorblaxians. Our spaceship crashed in your ‘Nevada Desert.’ Can you bring us 3 AAA batteries and a lasagna? Do not alert your ‘government.’ Thank you. — Glorp (Sent via iPhone 27)

day_3.subject: Daily Meeting Hall 4H Room 6th
day_3.body: Daily meeting conducting at 2PM, 21st floor. See you there!

day_3.subject: Daily Meeting at 31st floor Room 13th
day_3.body: You must come to room 13th on the 31st floor at exactly 4:16PM. You must come alone. DO NOT bring anyone else.

day_3.subject: BEWARE OF FAKE E-MAILS!
day_3.body: [NOTICE] It has come to our attention that fake emails has been sent to almost all of our employees, please be aware and read the sender's e-mail address carefully before interacting with such potentially harmful letters.

day_4.subject: Company Benefits
day_4.body: Your company benefits are immediately in active, welcome to the company!

day_4.subject: Art Department Collaboration
day_4.body: Hey! This is Menna from the Art Department. We were given instructions to collaborate closely with the Engineering Department for the upcoming tasks. Reply to this email to give us the go signal to start! Thanks.

day_4.subject: Collab with the Art Deparment
day_4.body: Good Morning! You must have received an e-mail from the Art Department by now. From now on, they will be working closely with the Engineering Team to ensure quality of the products we launch. Reply to this e-mail to confirm

day_4.subject: URGENT: Steal the Donut Recipe
day_4.body: We’ll pay $1 million if you infiltrate Dunkin’ HQ and retrieve the ‘Unicorn Sprinkles’ blueprint. Disguise yourself as a janitor. Reply ‘I LOVE COFFEE’ to confirm.

day_4.subject: I NEED HELP!
day_4.body: Hey man, this is your coworker Stewart, we have worked on the same tasks this week and I just wanted you to know that I am having a hard time finishing up this one feature can you help me?

day_4.subject: UPDATE ON MISSING SANDWICH
day_4.body: For the last few days, we have secretly put a security camera near the fridge and found out who was taking Stewart's Tuna Sandwiches. They have been suspended for an indefinite time.

day_4.subject: do not delete this email
day_4.body: you have been warned, this is my final warning. what you are seeing is not real!

day_5.subject: Meeting at 2PM 21st floor room 6th
day_5.body: Weekly check-in meeting with the whole team. See you there! P.S. DO NOT go to 31st floor. its under renovation.

day_5.subject: Hey
day_5.body: Hey, I know you are new here and we never really met each other personally, but we can assure you that we are real, its silly but I just thought you are doubting we aren't. Not because we are not but because we ARE! haha that's about it, enjoy your day!

day_5.subject: sheena, simon, harold, eric, kevin
day_5.body: sheena, simon, harold, eric, kevin sheena, simon, harold, eric, kevin sheena, simon, harold, eric, kevin sheena, simon, harold, eric, kevin sheena, simon, harold, eric, kevin sheena, simon, harold, eric, kevin

day_5.subject: THE BIRDS AREN’T REAL
day_5.body: WAKE UP! Pigeons are government drones. Attached: 500-page PDF proof. Meet me in the park at midnight. Bring tin foil. — TheTruther42

day_5.subject: More Free Cats!!!
day_5.body: Dear Human, My 64 cats have unionized and demand more treats. I need to rehome them ASAP. They’re fluent in Morse code and hate Mondays. Please adopt at least five. No returns. — Desperately Yours, Linda

day_5.subject: URGENT: POTATOES DEMAND EQUAL RIGHTS
day_5.body: ATTENTION! We, the Idaho #2375 Potato Collective, refuse to be mashed. Cancel Thanksgiving or we’ll revolt. Attached: Manifesto written in ketchup.

day_6.subject: Engineering Team Meeting @2PM
day_6.body: Daily Meeting is conducting at Room 6th, 21st floor

day_6.subject: Security Upgrades
day_6.body: [Attention] Thanks to the company's cyber security team, we have now filtered spam emails and everyone will not be getting any spams anymore. Big thanks to Eric and Kevin from the back-end team!

day_7.subject: Daily Meeting 2PM
day_7.body: 21st floor, Room 6th. We will be discussing about our projects new features and scale. Be there.

day_7.subject: Snack Time!
day_7.body: Boss has ordered to refill stocks for everybody, grab your snacks on the lounge area

day_7.subject: Thanks for the help!
day_7.body: hey man just wanted to say thanks for the help the past few days, it really help me a ton! btw, have you notice strange things happening in room 13?
Hi! we are conducting a meeting today at 4:16PM Room 13th on 31st floor. See ya there!

day_7.subject: coffee
day_7.body: simon simon simon simon simon simon simon simon simon simon simon simon simon simon simon simon simon simon simon simon simon simon simon simon simon simon simon simon simon simon simon simon simon simon simon simon simon simon simon simon
